plugins.name: Icon Builder
plugins.description:
Icon Builder is a versatile and intuitive Figma plugin that empowers designers and developers to convert their frames, components, and instances into fully customizable, export-ready React components.


Whether you’re refining a design system or crafting animated UI elements, Icon Builder makes scalable icon generation effortless.


👉 Dive deeper or contribute on GitHub: github.com/IvanDF/icon-builder
plugins.tagline: Easily create and customize icons for your projects

132076.name: Icon Builder
132076.description:

132076.release_notes: Enhance SVG export by adding className support and changing download folder to Icons
132076.tagline: Easily create and customize icons for your projects

plugins.name: Numeric Variable Checker
plugins.description:
Numeric Variable Checker は、Figma上で数値のハードコーディング（Variablesが適用されていない数値）を検出し、一覧で確認できるプラグインです。


対象は、padding・spacing・width・height・cornerRadius・strokeWeight などの数値プロパティ。


Variablesが未適用の数値だけを抽出し、親子階層を含めて再帰的にチェック。

該当のフレームにはワンクリックでジャンプできます。


-


Numeric Variable Checker is a Figma plugin that helps you detect and list raw numeric values in your design—such as padding, spacing, width, height, corner radius, and stroke weight—that are not yet connected to Variables.


Whether you're building a design system or refining your layout for scalability, this plugin ensures your numbers are consistent, maintainable, and tokenized.


It recursively scans all selected frames and their children, highlights unbound values, and lets you jump to each frame with one click.
plugins.tagline: For designs that stay consistent down to the pixel.

126488.name: Numeric Variable Checker
126488.description:
Numeric Variable Checker は、Figma上で数値のハードコーディング（Variablesが適用されていない数値）を検出し、一覧で確認できるプラグインです。


対象は、padding・spacing・width・height・cornerRadius・strokeWeight などの数値プロパティ。


Variablesが未適用の数値だけを抽出し、親子階層を含めて再帰的にチェック。

該当のフレームにはワンクリックでジャンプできます。


-


Numeric Variable Checker is a Figma plugin that helps you detect and list raw numeric values in your design—such as padding, spacing, width, height, corner radius, and stroke weight—that are not yet connected to Variables.


Whether you're building a design system or refining your layout for scalability, this plugin ensures your numbers are consistent, maintainable, and tokenized.


It recursively scans all selected frames and their children, highlights unbound values, and lets you jump to each frame with one click.
126488.tagline: For designs that stay consistent down to the pixel.

plugins.name: Populate Variables
plugins.description:
Easily visualize and apply Figma variables to your designs. This plugin helps you quickly populate components with variable data, create variable previews, and manage token implementation.


  1. Easily visualize Figma variables in the appearance you need
  2. Streamline design system work by automating token presentation
  3. Perfect for designers who work with design tokens and variables
plugins.tagline: Populate your variables the way you want them

125042.name: Populate Variables
125042.description:
Easily visualize and apply Figma variables to your designs. This plugin helps you quickly populate components with variable data, create variable previews, and manage token implementation.


  1. Easily visualize Figma variables in the appearance you need
  2. Streamline design system work by automating token presentation
  3. Perfect for designers who work with design tokens and variables
125042.tagline: Populate your variables the way you want them

plugins.name: Size Sync
plugins.description:
A convenient plugin for aligning sizes of multiple selected objects. Easily batch resize objects to match maximum/minimum widths or heights. Compatible with various objects including groups, frames, and shapes. Streamline your layout with 4 simple commands. Set up shortcuts for even faster workflow. Perfect for when you just need to match sizes without specifying exact width values - simple and efficient.


複数のオブジェクトを選択して、サイズを簡単に揃えることができるプラグインです。最大/最小の幅や高さに合わせて一括リサイズが可能です。グループ、フレーム、シェイプなど、様々なオブジェクトに対応しています。4つのコマンドで素早くレイアウトを整えることができます。ショートカットを設定することでクイックな作業を実現します。widthを数値で指定する必要がなく、ただ同じサイズに揃えたいだけのときに便利です。
plugins.tagline: Quick shortcuts for object size alignment.

125722.name: Size Sync
125722.description:
A convenient plugin for aligning sizes of multiple selected objects. Easily batch resize objects to match maximum/minimum widths or heights. Compatible with various objects including groups, frames, and shapes. Streamline your layout with 4 simple commands. Set up shortcuts for even faster workflow. Perfect for when you just need to match sizes without specifying exact width values - simple and efficient.


複数のオブジェクトを選択して、サイズを簡単に揃えることができるプラグインです。最大/最小の幅や高さに合わせて一括リサイズが可能です。グループ、フレーム、シェイプなど、様々なオブジェクトに対応しています。4つのコマンドで素早くレイアウトを整えることができます。ショートカットを設定することでクイックな作業を実現します。widthを数値で指定する必要がなく、ただ同じサイズに揃えたいだけのときに便利です。
125722.release_notes:
Updated to preserve aspect ratio when resizing objects
アスペクト比を保持してリサイズするように修正しました
125722.tagline: Quick shortcuts for object size alignment.

plugins.name: Copy Paste Text
plugins.description:
Transfer batches of text across multiple layers from one layout to another — exactly where it used to be done manually.


Features:

  1. Copy → Paste — Standard copy-paste for selected text layers
  2. Paste from clipboard — Paste multi-line text content from external sources
  3. Copy outer text — Copy text from Figma to clipboard for editing outside the project workspace

accepted.name: Alexey Skuratov
accepted.description: I Help scale SaaS and e-commerce products, through new design and functionality. Past: Viasat, Sberbank, Yandex

plugins.tagline: Save time by copying and pasting text layers between layouts where manual transfer is the only optio

plugins.name: ChromaPulse
plugins.description:
“ChromaPulse” is an image color analysis plugin of Figma, that extracts dominant and prominent colors from nodes which are filled with an image and generates palettes.


***** This plugin is a one-time paid plugin, with up to 5 trials available. *****


👉 Check out the details on ChromaPulse Website.

🔑 You can buy a License Key on Gumroad.


//


“ChromaPulse” は塗りに画像が設定されたノードのドミナントカラー（支配色）やプロミネントカラー（特長色）を抽出し、パレットを生成する Figma で動作する色調解析プラグインです。


***** このプラグインは1回払いの有料プラグインで、5回までのトライアルが可能です。 *****


👉 詳しくは ChromaPulse ウェブサイト をご覧ください。

🔑 ライセンスキーは Gumroad でご購入いただけます。
plugins.tagline: ChromaPulse is an image color analysis plugin of Figma, that extracts dominant and prominent colors.

We ignore everything that is not a frame, so all your annotations, random bits of text and images will not mess up your prototype.

plugins.name: Quick styles
plugins.description:
How does the plugin works:


Save a Style

1.Open the plugin library.

2.Select the layer you want to save styles from.

3.Click Save on one of the style slots in the plugin.

4.The style is saved!


Set a Shortcut

1.Open System Settings.

2.Navigate to Keyboard > Keyboard Shortcuts > App Shortcuts.

3.Click on the plus (+) icon.

4.Set the app to Figma in the menu.

5.Type the exact menu title name.

6.Set your shortcut and click Done!


Apply a Style

1.Select any layer.

2.Use the menu item or shortcut to apply styles!
plugins.tagline: Save properties of a layer and quickly apply them from the menu or using a shortcut.

117877.name: Quick styles
117877.description:

3.Click on the plus (+) icon.

4.Set the app to Figma in the menu.

5.Type the exact menu title name.

6.Set your shortcut and click Done!


Apply a Style

117877.tagline: Save properties of a layer and quickly apply them from the menu or using a shortcut.

plugins.name: 图形透视变换 Perspective Transform
plugins.description:
介绍

图形透视变换是一个强大的 Figma 插件，专为设计师打造，帮助您轻松实现矢量图形的透视变形。通过直观的界面和灵活的控制，您可以快速调整图形的四个角点，创造出专业级的设计效果。


功能说明

  1. 实时透视调整：通过拖动四个角点，实时调整矢量图形的透视效果。
  2. 精确控制：基于相对比例定位，确保变形的精准性和一致性。
  3. 自动更新：选择新的图形时，插件自动重新计算并定位角点。
  4. 重置功能：一键恢复图形到初始状态，方便反复调整。
  5. 兼容多种图形：支持矩形及简单的四边形矢量图形。


使用方法

  1. 在 Figma 中选择一个矩形或四边形矢量图形。
  2. 运行透视变换（专业版）插件。
  3. 在插件界面中，拖动四个角点以调整图形的透视效果。
  4. 点击“重置”按钮可将图形恢复到原始状态。
  5. 观察 Figma 中的图形实时更新，直至达到满意的设计效果。


注意事项

  1. 仅支持简单的四边形路径，复杂路径可能无法正确解析。
  2. 在使用插件前，建议备份原始图形以防止数据丢失。
  3. 插件当前版本不支持曲线或多路径的矢量图形。
  4. 确保 Figma 已更新到最新版本，以获得最佳使用体验。


Introduction

Perspective Transform Pro is a powerful Figma plugin designed for designers to effortlessly achieve perspective transformations on vector graphics. With an intuitive interface and flexible controls, you can quickly adjust the four corner points of your graphics to create professional-grade design effects.


Function Description

  1. Real-Time Perspective Adjustment: Manipulate the four corner points to adjust the perspective of vector graphics in real-time.
  2. Precise Control: Based on relative proportions, ensuring accuracy and consistency in transformations.
  3. Automatic Updates: Automatically recalculates and repositions corner points when selecting new graphics.
  4. Reset Functionality: One-click reset to restore graphics to their original state for easy adjustments.
  5. Compatibility with Various Shapes: Supports rectangles and simple quadrilateral vector graphics.


How to Use

  1. Select a rectangle or quadrilateral vector graphic in Figma.
  2. Run the Perspective Transform Pro plugin.
  3. In the plugin interface, drag the four corner points to adjust the perspective effect.
  4. Click the "Reset" button to restore the graphic to its original state.
  5. Observe the graphic in Figma updating in real-time until you achieve the desired design effect.


Precautions

  1. Supports only simple quadrilateral paths; complex paths may not parse correctly.
  2. It is recommended to backup original graphics before using the plugin to prevent data loss.
  3. The current version does not support curved or multi-path vector graphics.
  4. Ensure Figma is updated to the latest version for the best user experience.

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Advanced Perspective Transformation for Designers

111626.name: 图形透视变换 Perspective Transform
111626.description:

  2. 精确控制：基于相对比例定位，确保变形的精准性和一致性。

  4. 重置功能：一键恢复图形到初始状态，方便反复调整。

  3. 插件当前版本不支持曲线或多路径的矢量图形。

Introduction

With an intuitive interface and flexible controls, you can quickly adjust the four corner points of your graphics to create professional-grade design effects.

  1. Real-Time Perspective Adjustment: Manipulate the four corner points to adjust the perspective of vector graphics in real-time.
  2. Precise Control: Based on relative proportions, ensuring accuracy and consistency in transformations.
  3. Automatic Updates: Automatically recalculates and repositions corner points when selecting new graphics.
  4. Reset Functionality: One-click reset to restore graphics to their original state for easy adjustments.
  5. Compatibility with Various Shapes: Supports rectangles and simple quadrilateral vector graphics.


How to Use

  1. Select a rectangle or quadrilateral vector graphic in Figma.
  2. Run the Perspective Transform Pro plugin.
  3. In the plugin interface, drag the four corner points to adjust the perspective effect.

plugins.name: QuickToken
plugins.description:
QuickToken is the Figma plugin that enables instant variable import and seamless organization. Designed for designers who prioritize efficiency, QuickToken allows you to quickly insert variables into Figma’s local variables as design tokens. It supports collections and groups, keeping all variables clear and organized. Simplify your variable management and speed up your workflow with this powerful, efficient plugin!


Supported name schemes:


Create Variable Collection

#Collection


Create Variable Group

Group/


Create Variable

variable-name: value


The variable type recognition is automatically

based on the variable value itself.


Supported variable types


  1. Float 30
  2. Colors #333, #334455, rgb(0,100,100), rgba(2,2,2,0.1)
  3. Boolean: true, false
  4. String: 'Hello'
  5. Variable link: var(variable-name)

accepted.name: Roland Hidvegi
accepted.description: Roland Hidvegi is a Product Designer — crafting digital experiences, from vision to final touches, passionate about creating things that make people happy.

plugins.tagline: Instant variable import and organization in Figma.

plugins.name: DxH - Layer2JSON
plugins.description: DxH - Layer2JSON is a Figma plugin by Devxhub Ltd. that exports design layers (text, images, shapes) to structured JSON format. plugins.name: Geometric Tile Pattern SVG Generator
plugins.description:
Geometric Pattern Generator is a Figma plugin for creating beautiful, customizable geometric patterns. Built for designers who need professional-quality patterns fast, this plugin provides generation with granular control.


Key Features:


  1. Smart Generation: Instantly create unique patterns with randomized settings or manually adjust rows, columns, block size, colors, and big blocks chances
  2. Multiple Export Options: Download as PNG or SVG, or insert patterns directly into your Figma canvas as vector or raster graphics
  3. Developer-Friendly: View and copy HTML & CSS code, raw SVG markup, or URL-encoded versions for seamless web integration
  4. Smooth Workflow: Intuitive interface with real-time preview, smooth animations, and one-click generation


Perfect for creating backgrounds, textures, brand elements, or decorative graphics. Generate backgrounds for apps, websites, presentations, or print materials, get professional geometric patterns that would take hours to create manually – in just seconds.

From concept to code, this plugin bridges the gap between design and development, making it essential for modern design workflows.

plugins.name: CarouselCraft
plugins.description:
Diga adeus à criação manual de carrosséis! O CarouselCraft é o plugin definitivo para automatizar seu fluxo de trabalho no Figma, transformando dados JSON ou simples ideias em carrosséis completos e prontos para postar.


Passe menos tempo em tarefas repetitivas e mais tempo criando designs incríveis.


✨ Principais Funcionalidades


Criação via JSON: Cole uma estrutura de dados e veja o plugin montar carrosséis inteiros, com tema e textos, em um piscar de olhos.

Múltiplas Variações de Layout: Crie até 11 templates de design (`Cover-0`, `Content-0`, etc.) e teste diferentes estilos com facilidade.

Nomenclatura Inteligente: Seus frames são nomeados e organizados automaticamente, prontos para exportação.

Posicionamento Automático: O plugin alinha todos os slides e carrosséis perfeitamente na sua página.


---


🤖 Gere Conteúdo com IA (IA Craft)


Está sem ideias? Deixe nossa IA trabalhar por você! A funcionalidade IA Craft gera conteúdo para carrosséis completos com base em seus temas e público-alvo.


Plano Gratuito: Você pode gerar até 3 carrosséis usando a IA para testar todo o seu poder, a criação via Json é ilimitada

Plano Creator (R$ 12,90/mês): Gere carrosséis com IA de forma ilimitada e acelere sua produção de conteúdo como nunca antes.


---


🚀 Como Começar


1. Crie sua Conta: Para usar a automação e a IA, você precisa de um token de acesso. Crie sua conta gratuita em: https://carouselcraft.klotar.studio/

2. Prepare seus Templates: No Figma, crie seus frames com nomes numéricos (ex: `Cover-0`, `Content-0`, `End-0`).

3. Execute o Plugin: Abra o CarouselCraft, insira seu token, cole seu JSON ou use a aba "🤖 IA Craft".

4. Clique e Crie: Pronto! Seus carrosséis serão gerados instantaneamente.


O CarouselCraft é a ferramenta perfeita para social media, designers de UI/UX e criadores de conteúdo que buscam eficiência e consistência.
plugins.tagline: O fim do trabalho manual. Crie carrosséis perfeitos para Instagram em segundos.

plugins.name: SVG Exporter
plugins.description:
Este plugin te permite exportar elementos gráficos (assets) en formato SVG desde cualquier Frame que selecciones en Figma. Al ejecutarlo:

1. El plugin detecta automáticamente los vectores, íconos y componentes dentro del frame seleccionado.

2. Muestra una lista con vista previa de cada asset, su nombre y tipo (VECTOR, LINE, COMPONENT, etc.).

3. Puedes filtrar por tipo, seleccionar o deseleccionar assets individualmente o todos a la vez.

4. Al hacer clic en “Exportar selección”, los archivos se descargan en un ZIP listo para usar.


Uso paso a paso:

• Selecciona un Frame que contenga los assets que deseas exportar.

• Ejecuta el plugin.

• Filtra, selecciona y exporta.


Limitaciones actuales:

• Solo funciona si seleccionas un Frame (no soporta múltiples frames a la vez).

• Solo exporta elementos compatibles con formato SVG.

• No incluye imágenes rasterizadas, texto plano ni auto layout como exportables.

• No detecta automáticamente cambios de selección; requiere usar el botón “Actualizar selección”.



-----------------------------------------


This plugin lets you export graphical elements (assets) as SVG files from any selected Frame in Figma.


When you run the plugin:

1. It scans the selected frame for valid exportable elements (e.g., VECTORS, ICONS, COMPONENTS).

2. You’ll see a list of assets with preview thumbnails, names, and their Figma types.

3. You can filter by type, toggle selection, and bulk-select assets.

4. Clicking “Export Selection” downloads all selected assets as a clean ZIP file of SVGs.


How to use it:

• Select a Frame that contains the assets you want to export.

• Launch the plugin.

• Use the filters, select assets, and export.


Current limitations:

• Only one Frame can be selected at a time.

• Only elements that support SVG export will be included (e.g., no bitmaps or text layers).

• Does not automatically react to new selections — use the “Refresh Selection” button manually when needed.
plugins.tagline: Exporta fácilmente assets SVG desde frames seleccionados en Figma, con vista previa y filtros.

plugins.name: Text Auto Fill
plugins.description:
Figma Plugin User Guide for Beginners


What It Does

This Figma plugin lets you update text and hide layers in selected frames or instances. It’s easy to use with a text-based configuration for both specific and global changes.


How to Use It

  1. Select a Frame or Instance: In Figma, click a frame or instance to edit.
  2. Open the Plugin: Run the plugin from Figma’s menu (Plugins > Your Plugin Name).
  3. Enter Configuration: In the plugin window, type instructions to change text or hide layers (see examples below).
  4. Click Run: The plugin applies your changes instantly.


Configuration Examples

• Change Specific Text: To update text in a layer named title inside a frame named block, type:

block.title: Hello World

This sets the title layer’s text to "Hello World".


• Change Text Globally: To update all layers named text in any frame, type:

text: Welcome

This changes every text layer’s text to "Welcome".


• Hide a Specific Layer: To hide a layer named subtitle in the block frame, type:

//block.subtitle

This hides the subtitle layer.


• Hide a Layer Globally: To hide all layers named icon, type:

//icon

This hides every icon layer.


• Rename a Frame: To rename a frame named block, type:

$Title block: New Frame Name

This renames the frame to "New Frame Name".


• Combine Actions: Mix specific and global changes, like:

block.title: Welcome
text: Hello
//block.subtitle
//icon

This updates block.title to "Welcome", all text layers to "Hello", hides block.subtitle, and hides all icon layers.


Tips

  1. Write one instruction per line.
  2. Layer names must match exactly (case-sensitive).
  3. Select at least one frame or instance, or you’ll get an error.
plugins.tagline: Automatically update text in frames with key-value data

135574.name: Text Auto Fill
135574.description:
Figma Plugin User Guide for Beginners


What It Does

This Figma plugin lets you update text and hide layers in selected frames or instances. It’s easy to use with a text-based configuration for both specific and global changes.


How to Use It

  1. Select a Frame or Instance: In Figma, click a frame or instance to edit.
  2. Open the Plugin: Run the plugin from Figma’s menu (Plugins > Your Plugin Name).
  3. Enter Configuration: In the plugin window, type instructions to change text or hide layers (see examples below).
  4. Click Run: The plugin applies your changes instantly.


Configuration Examples

• Change Specific Text: To update text in a layer named title inside a frame named block, type:

block.title: Hello World

This sets the title layer’s text to "Hello World".


• Change Text Globally: To update all layers named text in any frame, type:

text: Welcome

This changes every text layer’s text to "Welcome".


• Hide a Specific Layer: To hide a layer named subtitle in the block frame, type:

//block.subtitle

This hides the subtitle layer.


• Hide a Layer Globally: To hide all layers named icon, type:

//icon

This hides every icon layer.


• Rename a Frame: To rename a frame named block, type:

$Title block: New Frame Name

This renames the frame to "New Frame Name".


• Combine Actions: Mix specific and global changes, like:

block.title: Welcome
text: Hello
//block.subtitle
//icon

This updates block.title to "Welcome", all text layers to "Hello", hides block.subtitle, and hides all icon layers.


Tips

  1. Write one instruction per line.
  2. Layer names must match exactly (case-sensitive).
  3. Select at least one frame or instance, or you’ll get an error.
135574.tagline: Automatically update text in frames with key-value data

plugins.name: Frame Navigator
plugins.description:
🧭 FrameNavigator


Effortlessly navigate large and complex Figma files with FrameNavigator — a floating Table of Contents plugin that helps you stay organized and move between frames in a single click.


✨ Key Features


- Quick Navigation

Instantly jump to any frame from a floating panel that stays visible while you work.


- Custom Frame Registration

Select frames directly on the canvas and add them to your TOC with a simple "+" button.


- Group Organization

Organize your frames into custom groups for better structure and clarity—perfect for managing multiple screens.


- Flexible Panel Sizes

Choose between default, compact, and full views to match your workflow and screen space.


---


🛠 How It Works


  1. Register a Frame: Select a frame on the Figma canvas and click the `+` button in the plugin to add it to the TOC.
  2. Create a Group: Hover over ungrouped frames in the TOC and click the appearing checkbox to select them. Then click the Create Group button at the top of the panel to group them.
  3. Add to Existing Group: Select a group first, then select a new frame on the canvas and click `+` to add the frame into that group.
  4. Rename a Group: Double-click on a group name to edit it.
  5. Remove a Group: Right-click on a group and select **Remove Group**. ⚠️ Note: All frames inside that group will also be removed from the TOC.
  6. Reorder Frames: Drag and drop frames (or groups) within the TOC to change their order.


---


Perfect for design system creators, large prototyping flows, or anyone managing multi-screen layouts in Figma.
plugins.tagline: Quickly jump between frames with a floating table of contents. Easily build your own TOC.

129320.description:

  3. Add to Existing Group: Select a group first, then select a new frame on the canvas and click `+` to add the frame into that group.

plugins.name: Asterisk
plugins.description:
Asterisk creates a personal knowledge system within your Figma files. Add context to any design element with custom tags, notes, and reference links. Quickly search and navigate to specific elements, making complex files manageable. Created for designers who want to add meaningful annotations to their file with contextual search to maintain clarity and effortless navigation.


📝 Add notes and custom tags to any layer in your file

🌐 Add URLs to images for instant access to their source

🔍 Find any element instantly with powerful search and filter functionality

⚡ One-click navigation to any tagged element

*️⃣ Personalise your experience with fully customizable display options


*Free to use while in beta ~ provide feedback for lifetime free access 💚
plugins.tagline: *Add searchable notes, tags, and links to elements to organize, explore, and navigate effortlessly

plugins.name: QR Code Generator
plugins.description:
Generate QR codes without leaving Figma. Customize with your own link, logo and colors.


This plugin creates static QR codes in SVG format, so they can be resized without losing quality. It uses RecodeQR to generate the image (no account needed). The QR codes are fully self-contained: they don’t rely on our service and they’re yours forever.


Tip: To scan QR codes you can use the camera app on iOS, or you can also inspect them online.
plugins.tagline: Create QR codes without leaving Figma

126163.name: QR Code Generator
126163.description:
Generate QR codes without leaving Figma. Customize with your own link, logo and colors.


This plugin creates static QR codes in SVG format, so they can be resized without losing quality. It uses RecodeQR to generate the image (no account needed). The QR codes are fully self-contained: they don’t rely on our service and they’re yours forever.


Tip: To scan QR codes you can use the camera app on iOS, or you can also inspect them online.

networkAccess.reasoning: This plugin requires network access to RecodeQR's API to generate QR codes. No user data is stored.

126163.release_notes: Fixed dark mode, improve community details
126163.tagline: Create QR codes without leaving Figma

plugins.name: Draft Alpha
plugins.description:
DraftAlpha – Figma Plugin

Deliver consistent UX content aligned with your brand guidelines


DraftAlpha enables you to effortlessly create, collaborate, and maintain brand-consistent UX content directly within Figma.


Key Features:


✅ AI-powered Brand Guidelines Builder

- Instantly generate tailored brand guidelines, including writing rules, tone of voice, target audience, and brand pillars.

- Customize guidelines precisely to reflect your brand identity.


✅ Content Consistency & Compliance

- Automatically check content for adherence to your established brand guidelines.

- Generate multiple content variants aligned with your brand.


✅ Centralized Content & Collaboration

- Single source of truth for all UX copy and team collaboration.

- Approval workflows, user roles, and content status management.

- Build reusable content components with localization support.


✅ Seamless Localization

- Quickly generate brand-consistent localized content in 20+ languages.

- Manage and apply localization variants directly in Figma.


✅ Integrated Figma Workflow

- Access your content library and apply content to designs instantly.

- Real-time brand guideline compliance checking within your design files.

- Effortlessly preview designs across multiple language variants.
plugins.tagline: Deliver UX Content consistent with brand guidelines

plugins.name: howly-figma-plugin
plugins.description:
1. The exported tokens in JSON file follow Design Tokens Properties format.
  2. Each Mode in the Collection exports an independent JSON file.
  3. Collection and Mode names are transformed to kebab-case.
  4. JSON file name follows pattern: {collection-name}.{mode-name}.tokens.json
plugins.tagline: Export design tokens to JSON

plugins.name: ChromaGrab
plugins.description:
ChromaGrab: The Ultimate Colour Extraction & Palette Generator for Figma


Transform any image or selection into a professional colour system with ChromaGrab. Extract, refine, and generate beautiful colour palettes with precision and ease. 🎨


Key Features:


• Instant colour extraction from any image or selection

• Smart colour spectrum generation with customisable saturation

• Automatic colour variable creation with semantic naming

• Drag-and-drop colour organisation

• Seamless gradient generation

• Professional-grade hex colour input with live preview


Whether you're building a design system, creating gradients, or exploring colour variations, ChromaGrab streamlines your colour workflow. Perfect for designers who need quick access to harmonious colour palettes without compromising on quality or flexibility.


Transform your colour workflow today with ChromaGrab – where precision meets creativity.

accepted.name: Karl Koch
accepted.description: Currently building DuckDuckGo, Cosmic, Hand››over, and plugins.run.

plugins.tagline: Extract, refine, and generate beautiful colour palettes from images with precision and ease.

plugins.name: Find Duplicates
plugins.description: Effortlessly manage your Figma layers with this plugin that scans the root-level children of a selected node and identifies duplicates by name. Save time by automatically selecting all nodes with identical names, ensuring a clean and organized design structure. Ideal for designers working with complex hierarchies and naming conventions
plugins.tagline: Find and Select Nodes with Duplicate Names at Root Level

120277.tagline: Find and Select Nodes with Duplicate Names at Root Level

plugins.name: Icons to GitLab
plugins.description:
This plugin can help you export SVG from Figma directly to a GitLab repository.


It currently supports the following features:

- Export the selected components or instances to GitLab

- If the file already exists in the repository, it will be updated
plugins.tagline: Export SVG from Figma directly to a GitLab repository

plugins.name: Rename Frames to Gap
plugins.description:
使い方：

オートレイアウトが設定されているフレームを選択してプラグインを使用すると選択したフレームが自動的にオートレイアウトのギャップの値を元にリネームされます。

plugins.name: Keyword-Based Ungrouper
plugins.description: This plugin allows you to ungroup elements in your Figma design based on user-specified keywords. Simply input the keywords, and the plugin will automatically find and ungroup all elements that match the criteria. Enhance your design workflow by quickly managing grouped elements with precision.
plugins.tagline: Ungroup elements based on specified keywords

Simply input the keywords, and the plugin will automatically find and ungroup all elements that match the criteria. Enhance your design workflow by quickly managing grouped elements with precision.
115692.tagline: Ungroup elements based on specified keywords

plugins.name: Resizer and Organizer
plugins.description: Resizer and Organizer is a Figma plugin for quickly resizing logos, Shapes and Frames to consistent dimensions and arranging them in neat, customizable grids. Perfect for designers who want to streamline their workflow, this plugin allows you to define grid rows, columns, and spacing while maintaining clean, professional layouts.
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly Resize and Organize Your Logos or Shapes into Perfect Grids!

115704.name: Resizer and Organizer
115704.description: Resizer and Organizer is a Figma plugin for quickly resizing logos, Shapes and Frames to consistent dimensions and arranging them in neat, customizable grids. Perfect for designers who want to streamline their workflow, this plugin allows you to define grid rows, columns, and spacing while maintaining clean, professional layouts.
115704.tagline: Effortlessly Resize and Organize Your Logos or Shapes into Perfect Grids!

plugins.name: Composer
plugins.description:
Quickly organise your components in a structured grid.

Composer helps you quickly arrange component variants in Figma, making your workspace more organised and efficient.


⚡️ Key features:

  1. Auto-Layout Support.
  2. Easily adjust spacing and positioning to fit your needs.
  3. Structure your components in a clear format up to a 4×4 Grid Layout.
  4. Instantly add a dark background behind selection for better visibility.


Keep your projects clean, organised, and faster to ship into integration! 🚀
plugins.tagline: Composer helps you quickly arrange component variants

121346.name: Composer
121346.description:

121346.tagline: Composer helps you quickly arrange component variants

plugins.name: Synchronize Frames
plugins.description:
This program enhances efficiency in Figma by allowing users to synchronize frames automatically. It ensures that any modifications made to a selected frame are instantly reflected in all corresponding frames, promoting consistency across designs. The user interface features intuitive buttons to assign frames, toggle synchronization, and activate auto-sync capabilities.


To automatically search for frames for synchronization, the "SS_" tag must be specified before the frame name.
plugins.tagline: Seamlessly synchronize your design frames for a more efficient workflow

113339.tagline: Seamlessly synchronize your design frames for a more efficient workflow
